card.note: Thanks for making the season lots of fun. I like you as my coach because you tell silly jokes, but they are really funny. I mean that, they really are. Ha Ha. Steve( pitcher Steve, not 1st base Steve!)
card.author: Steve "Lefty"

card.note: I liked you as our coach because you made the season a lot of fun, even though we didn't win much. I especially liked when we would race around the bases in practice. I still say I won that time even though you said Greg did.
card.author: Ty

card.note: I wish we had won more games, but maybe next year(like the Cubs). I really liked how you taught me not to be afraid of the ball. It helped me hang in there and get more hits. I hope you are my coach next year.
card.author: Brooks

card.note: My Dad said I should tell you we reminded him of the Bad News Bears, whatever that means. I especially liked when you gave us gummy bears before the big game and told us they would help with the butterflies in our stomachs.
card.author: Reggie

card.note: Coach Smith, please let me play outfield next year because I don't like being the catcher. I don't care if being a catcher is the easiest path to the majors. It hurts my knees. But, I liked you a lot anyway. You're pretty cool.
card.author: Yogi

card.note: I liked how you taught me how to hit the low and away slider. I was really having problems with that. One more thing. Next year I hope Jimmy's Dad is a bit calmer so that you don't have to ask him to stop yelling. Maybe you can talk to him about it.
card.author: Pat

card.note: I liked how you taught me how to hit the low and away slider. I was really having problems with that. One more thing. Next year I hope Jimmy's Dad is a bit calmer so that you don't have to ask him to stop yelling. Maybe you can talk to him about it.
card.author: Pat

card.note: I really liked you as our coach because even though I stuck out a lot, you never got frustrated with me. Dad says we can go to the batting cage over the winter and practice. I can't wait until next season so you can see how I'll have improved(well, I hope so!)
card.author: Jimmy F.

card.note: I liked how you let everyone play in each game. I know I'm not the best player, but I always knew I had to practice hard because I'd get to play. It made us all pull together for the team.
card.author: Henry "Hammerin Hank"

card.note: I liked Coach Smith because he always suggested we get ice cream after the game even when we lost. Mom and Dad don't take me to get ice cream enough, so I was always up for it.
card.author: Herman"Babe" R.

card.note: Coach Smith was the BEST!! He taught me how play second base and now I love it. I didn't really want to play this year, but now I can't wait until next year. Jimmy, our shortstop, and I are going to practice making a double play. See you next season.
card.author: Chase

card.note: I liked how you taught me how to hit the low and away slider. I was really having problems with that. One more thing. Next year I hope Jimmy's Dad is a bit calmer so that you don't have to ask him to stop yelling. Maybe you can talk to him about it.
